ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] [OT] Fascinating Article
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The statistical quirk results from the difference in numbers between male and female players.  It s possible for 69% of women to equal 16% of men, if there
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:06 AM 2/18/2002 -0800, you wrote:

>Skimming the article, a bizarre statistical quirk appears...69% of women play
>with a "romantic partner", while only 16% of men do.
>
>So who the hell are the partners the additional 53% of women are playing
>with? Shouldn't the two numbers for the two sexes be nearly identical? Are
>52% of the women lesbians, 26% playing with the other 26%?

The statistical quirk results from the difference in numbers between male
and female players. It's possible for 69% of women to equal 16% of men, if
there are that many more men (as we see in the statistics - over 2000 men
vs less than 400 women)

Talies
